title: MoMo FS AI Hackathon — 1st Prize
description: Led a cross-functional team to design and integrate an AI-powered chatbot into MoMo's Mini-App ecosystem, enabling users to interact with UI through natural language. Defined system architecture for LLM-based interaction layer with chatbot-driven navigation and contextual response handling within financial workflows.

title: TechDay 2025 Hackathon — 2nd Prize
description: Led development of an AI-driven mobile testing solution capable of executing automated application tests and generating structured test cases for regression coverage. Designed workflow combining AI-based UI inspection and test case synthesis to reduce manual QA effort.

title: Internal Automation & Engineering Initiative
description: Initiated and developed internal automation testing framework to improve regression reliability for financial mini-apps. Promoted automation-first mindset within development workflow, supporting QA and reducing manual testing overhead.

title: B.Sc. Information Technology — GPA 3.4/4.0
description: Graduated from University of Science, Ho Chi Minh City. Relevant coursework: Data Structures & Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Software Engineering.
